recommendations.recommendation:
If you like the "I have to survive" genre, it`s a solid anime.
Starts weird but feels decent as it evolves in plot.
Shame that this is still made as a promotional tool for the game because of the end. If this gets a second season, it may change to something completely worth to watch by many (I doubt that it will happen).

anime.description: * Based on http://anidb.net/cr1130 [Square Enix]`s arcade trading card game. Tokyo, 2030. A high-frequency resonance is suddenly heard in a suburban area, and at the same time, the entire town is shrouded in a red mist. All living things that hear the sounds, human and animal alike, lose consciousness. The phenomenon is assumed to be an unidentified virus, so due to fear of a spreading epidemic, Tokyo is blocked off from the rest of the country. About six months later, all the people who had lost consciousness awaken as if nothing ever happened. However, strange incidents start happening on that same day, and the city becomes engulfed by a chain of cruel destinies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 憎らしい敵がなぜに慕わしい
Why Do I Love My Despised Enemy
Un ennemi aussi détestable que bien-aimé
Nikurashii Teki ga Naze ni Shitawashii
episode.summary: If you want to save the world, destroy Tokyo! Chihiro and his friends are bewildered by Dux`s unexpected words. However, believing he`s destined to destroy everything he comes across, Chihiro ignores the warnings of his friends and smashes his immense power against Tokyo! While Chihiro and Yuri are battling, they`re confined within a mysterious extradimensional space. Though they are enemies, Yuri makes a surprising suggestion...! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: だれだ, 古い争いに新たに火をつけたのは?
Who Set Fire to an Old Conflict?
Qui ose raviver le feu d`une guerre passée ?
Dare Da, Furui Arasoi ni Arata ni Hi o Tsuketa no wa?
episode.summary: Only the chosen warriors known as Vessels of Heroic Blood possess the ability to turn their own blood into weapons known as blood armaments. First Chihiro, then his friend Kotetsu awaken as Vessels of Heroic Blood. And who are these people who keep transforming innocent people into monsters?! The Vessels who awakened one after another throughout the course of a fierce battle are taken to Maldeus Church. Once they arrive, the mysteriuos girl Dux has something to tell them... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 君はまだ, ぼくという人間を知らないのだ
You Don`t Know Who I Am Yet
Tu ne connais pas encore l`humain que je suis
Kimi wa Mada, Boku to Iu Ningen o Shiranai no Da
episode.summary: The man who was like a father to the solitary Chihiro transformed into a giant troll before his eyes. Unable to fight properly, when Chihiro is struck by the creature`s blade, his eyes glow a deep red, and something begins to awaken inside him! Can the blood staining his hands never be wiped clean? As Chihiro despairs, the mysterious and beautiful Yuri appears before him. The sound of her bells drags Chihiro into an even more unforgiving battle! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我が命は敵に払う借金か
Our Lives Are the Debt We Pay Our Enemies
Ma vie est-elle une dette contractée auprès de mes ennemis ?
Waga Inochi wa Teki ni Harau Shakkinka
episode.summary: Tokyo was suddenly assaulted by the Great Collapse! The moment they heard it, everyone in the city fell into a coma. When they awoke, Tokyo was enveloped in a red mist. Though some plotted to escape, not a single person has made it through the red mist alive, and Tokyo has become inaccessible. Tokyo is now a shadowy and inaccessible city from which there is no escape! Five months later, the very last person still in a coma, univeristy student Kamina Chihiro awakens, and curtains rise on the fierce Vermillion legend! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Ending
Opening
死ぬほどつらい悲しみも別の苦悩で癒えるもの.
Excruciating Sadness Can Be Cured by Other Anguish
Il n`est pas de tristesse que l`adversité ne sache guérir
Shinu Hodo Tsurai Kanashimi mo Betsu no Kunou de Ieru Mono.
episode.summary: I want to resist fate. I want to save my friends from death. Hoping to achieve these goals, Chihiro decides to work with agent of Chaos Yuri. He asks Marie, Tsubaki, and the Guardian State to fight with him. Rather than destroying Tokyo, he believes the best option is for everyone to work together so the Heroic Lindeage survives. However, fate does not abide such naive thoughts, and instead leads Chihiro to the worst possible end...! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: どうか二人の手を聖なる言葉で結んでください
Please Join Our Hands with the Holy Words
Unissez-les par ces paroles sacrées
Douka Futari no Te o Seinaru Kotoba de Musunde Kudasai
episode.summary: When Inuki, who was like a brother to Jun, is killed by Chihiro, Jun swears revenge. Shoko plots to become the last remaining survivor so she can become the Lord of Vermilion. Yuri continues to have secret meetings with Chihiro. Unbeknownst to one another, the vessels of Heroic Lineage begin to turn their various motives into action. Meanwhile, Chihiro has a dream in which Kotetesu dies...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暗い心には明るい光が相応しい
Bright Lights Suit a Dark Heart
Aux âmes sombres, rien ne sied mieux que la lumière
Kurai Kokoro ni wa Akarui Hikari ga Fusawashii
episode.summary: As a mysterious series of murders occur in Tokyo, Inuki goes missing. Chihiro desperately searched for him, but he`s informed Inuki is the traitor. Just as Chihiro`s not sure what to believe, Yuri appears before him. Though they know they are enemies would must kill one another, they express themselves with words and feel a complicated calmness... Meanwhile, Inuki continues to plunge towards destruction. Chihiro dons his blood armaments in order to save him. What is waiting for him at the end of a fierce battle?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 今日の暗い運命は, この先ずっと垂れ込める
Today`s Dark Destiny Will Hang over the Future
L`ombre de la fatalité plane sur l`avenir
Kyou no Kurai Unmei wa, Konosaki Zutto Tarekomeru
episode.summary: It`s all because of your mother. Chihiro can`t stop thinking about what Yuri said to him. Do they have something to do with the lost memories of his childhood? The past Kakihara describes to Chihiro is a heartbreaking tragedy. Inuki desperately tries to save Chihiro as he despairs at his bloody fate. Will they be able to change their destinies? Just when he thinks he`s found a glimmer of hope, Inuki is visited by his own terrifying tragedy! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 死を前にして人は陽気になることがあるという
Sometimes People Become Cheerful When Faced with Death
Face à la mort, certains ressentent de la joie
Shi o Mae ni Shite Hito wa Youki ni Naru Koto ga Aru to Iu
episode.summary: Chihiro is betrayed by Yuri and deserted by the Guardian State. No matter how much he fights them, his prophetic dreams of despair keep coming true. Despite this, he continues to desperately struggle to change fate. Chihiro`s behavior inspires Kakihara to look into his past again. Did Chihiro really kill is own father?! What truth is hidden within that bloody tragedy?! Meanwhile, Chihiro dreams of Kakihara`s death. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我が名を呼ぶのは, 我が魂
My Soul Calls My Name
Cet appel provient de mon âme
Waga Na o Yobu no wa, Waga Tamashii
episode.summary: The AVAL Science Foundation has been attempting to cause a Second Great Collapse by installing artificial keystones throughout the city! At this rate, everyone in Tokyo will be transformed into monsters, and the city will become a hellscape! In order to stop their plot, Chihiro and his friends head to the Infinity Theater where Kark Kaburagi is performing a concert. As the reaper`s deadly melody rings throughout the theater, total war breaks out between Chihiro`s friends and the AVAL Science Foundation. Will they be able to stop the Second Great Collapse?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: か弱き花の蕾には, 薬もあれば毒もある.
The Delicate Flower Bud Is Both Medicine and Poison
Les frêles fleurs en bourgeon peuvent être un remède comme un poison
Kayowaki Hana no Tsubomi ni wa, Kusuri mo Areba Doku mo Aru.
episode.summary: Are the vessels of Heroic Blood destined to fight one another and die? Friend and foe alike are slain by the end of a bloody battle. All they leave behind are the blood crystals that serve as their grave markers... However, the survivors must continue to fight for the fate of the world. Though his plan was stopped once, Grumman throws Chiyu into the ring to forcibly open gates to other worlds. Caught between her father Grumman and Chihiro, Yuri is distraught, and she brings about another tragedy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 世界は広く, 果てしない
The World Is Vast and Infinite
Un monde vaste et infini
Sekai wa Hiroku, Hateshinai
episode.summary: The gate to another world is finally opened, and Tokyo begins to collapse! As Chihiro and his allies head to the location of their final confrontation in order to end it all, a terrifying enemy blocks their path...! Were the stars aligned against them? Was this always destined to happen? Their hearts that are drawn to one another and the love they`ve nurtured are washed away by the massive waves of fate, and they are confronted with sadness. How will the story of the couple that has continually resisted fate end...?! Source: crunchyroll
